name: Mac OS 8
common_names: Mac OS 7.7 (former name), Veronica, Tempo, Allegro, Veronica Macintosh
character_details: There are two similar Mac OS8-tan designs, one of which is an older version of the other; which depiction is used depends on the continuity. Mac OS 8-tan in OSC canon is more outgoing, and slightly war-torn (after the market competition wars with Microsoft in the mid-to-late 1990's), but with the same cheerful disposition as her younger self. The beret she wears, as well as her proficiency in bomb-wielding, is also a throwback to the younger version. She often accompanies Mac-tan/Mac OSX-tan on the daily sorties against perverts, particularly the Mac OSX-kuns.
